verses.text: To every \add thing there is\add* a \w season|strong="H2165"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to every \w purpose|strong="H2656"\w* under the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*:

A \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to be \w born|strong="H3205"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w plant|strong="H5193"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to pluck \w up|strong="H6131"\w* \add that which is\add* \w planted|strong="H5193"\w*;\f + \fr 3.2 \ft to be…: Heb. to bear\f*

A \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w kill|strong="H2026"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w heal|strong="H7495"\w*; a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to break \w down|strong="H6555"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to build \w up|strong="H1129"\w*;

A \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w weep|strong="H1058"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w*; a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w dance|strong="H7540"\w*;

A \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to cast \w away|strong="H7993"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w gather|strong="H3664"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w together|strong="H3664"\w*; a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w embrace|strong="H2263"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w refrain|strong="H7368"\w* from \w embracing|strong="H2263"\w*;\f + \fr 3.5 \ft to refrain from: Heb. to be far from\f*

A \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w get|strong="H1245"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w lose|strong="H0006"\w*; a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to cast \w away|strong="H7993"\w*;\f + \fr 3.6 \ft get: or, seek\f*

A \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w rend|strong="H7167"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w sew|strong="H8609"\w*; a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to keep \w silence|strong="H2814"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*;

A \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w love|strong="H0157"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w hate|strong="H8130"\w*; a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, and a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.
What \w profit|strong="H3504"\w* hath he that \w worketh|strong="H6213"\w* in that \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* he \w laboureth|strong="H6001"\w*?

I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* the \w travail|strong="H6045"\w*, which \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w* to be \w exercised|strong="H6031"\w* in it.

He hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* every \add thing\add* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* in his \w time|strong="H6256"\w*: also he hath \w set|strong="H5414"\w* the \w world|strong="H5769"\w* in their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, so \w that|strong="H1097"\w* no \w man|strong="H0120"\w* can find \w out|strong="H4672"\w* the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* from the \w beginning|strong="H7218"\w* to the \w end|strong="H5490"\w*.

I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that \add there is\add* no \w good|strong="H2896"\w* in them, but for \add a man\add* to \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, and to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* in his \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

And also that every \w man|strong="H0120"\w* should \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, and \w enjoy|strong="H7200"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* of all his \w labour|strong="H5999"\w*, it \add is\add* the \w gift|strong="H4991"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that, whatsoever \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w*, it shall be for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: \w nothing|strong="H0369"\w* can be \w put|strong="H3254"\w* to it, nor any thing \w taken|strong="H1639"\w* from it: and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*, that \add men\add* should \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

That which hath been is \w now|strong="H3528"\w*; and that which is to be hath \w already|strong="H3528"\w* been; and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w requireth|strong="H1245"\w* that which is \w past|strong="H7291"\w*.\f + \fr 3.15 \ft that which is past: Heb. that which is driven away\f*

¶ And moreover I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* under the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \add that\add* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w* \add was\add* there; and the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, \add that\add* \w iniquity|strong="H7562"\w* \add was\add* there.

I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* and the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*: for \add there is\add* a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* there for every \w purpose|strong="H2656"\w* and for every \w work|strong="H4639"\w*.

I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* concerning the \w estate|strong="H1700"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* might \w manifest|strong="H1305"\w* them, and that they might \w see|strong="H7200"\w* that \w they|strong="H1992"\w* themselves are \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*.\f + \fr 3.18 \ft that God…: or, that they might clear God, and see, etc\f*

For that which \w befalleth|strong="H4745"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w befalleth|strong="H4745"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*; even one \w thing|strong="H0259"\w* \w befalleth|strong="H4745"\w* them: as the one \w dieth|strong="H4194"\w*, so \w dieth|strong="H4194"\w* the \w other|strong="H2088"\w*; yea, they have all \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w*; so that a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* hath no \w preeminence|strong="H4195"\w* above a \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*: for all \add is\add* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*.

All \w go|strong="H1980"\w* unto \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*; all are of the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, and all \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* to \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

Who \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w man|strong="H1121"\w* that \w goeth|strong="H5927"\w* \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, and the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* that \w goeth|strong="H3381"\w* \w downward|strong="H4295"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*?\f + \fr 3.21 \ft of man: Heb. of the sons of man\f*\f + \fr 3.21 \ft goeth upward: Heb. is ascending, etc\f*

Wherefore I \w perceive|strong="H7200"\w* that \add there is\add* nothing \w better|strong="H2896"\w*, than that a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* should \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in his own \w works|strong="H4639"\w*; for that \add is\add* his \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*: for who shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* him to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* what shall be \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him?
